abstract: Microsoft on Thursday cited “an unacceptable number of repairs” to its Xbox 360 for the charge, and announced an extended warranty for the video game console.
snippet: Microsoft on Thursday cited “an unacceptable number of repairs” to its Xbox 360 for the charge, and announced an extended warranty for the video game console.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES, July 5 — In what may be one of the costliest consumer warranty repairs in history, Microsoft announced on Thursday that it would spend up to $1.15 billion to repair failing Xbox 360 game machine consoles.

headline.main: Microsoft to Spend $1.15 Billion for Xbox Repairs
headline.print_headline: Microsoft to Spend $1.15 Billion for Xbox 360 Repairs
